New Records: Yashasvi Jaiswal scored 93 not out off just 53 balls
Shubman Gill scored his second half-century of the series as a Captain
Sikandar Raza became the first Zimbabwean batter to surpass 2000 T20I runs
Key Match Events: Yashasvi Jaiswal and Shubman Gill made light work of the target with a 151-run partnership
Pre-Game Insights: Shubman Gill said that it's a fresh wicket and there is going to be something helpful for the fast bowlers first up
Sikandar Raza said that they would have batted first anyway and the series is still alive
Dion Myers expressed his gratitude to Tino Mawoyo for the opportunity
Post-Match Reflections: Shubman Gill expressed his happiness with his first series win as captain
Yashasvi Jaiswal said that he really enjoyed his batting and he had plans for different bowlers as well
Sikandar Raza reflected on the match, stating that the wicket was slightly on the slower side initially
Miscellaneous Highlights: The pitch report indicates that it is a fresh pitch today
Tushar Deshpande, the debutant for India, said that it is a dream come true for him to represent his country
